website_summaries.verdict: This HUE bulb is 3rd generation, so many of the compatibility and color issues have been addressed. We like its ability to work independently or in a programmable set.
pros: 3rd generation, produces stronger blues and greens
Capable of creating specific  lighting scenes for different rooms and times
Compatible with numerous home controller systems
cons: HUE controller app has some performance issues
More expensive than standard white smart or LED bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting solution!
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced all my Wemo lights with Hue. Compared to Wemo, Hue was extremely easy to setup. The color range is amazing and it works well with Alexa. As with some of the other comment, I wish the Hue App was a little more robust. You can set basic features and scenes but you have to download multiple 3rd party applications to do more sophisticated arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: Cory L

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several lights before purchasing Philips. They are easy to set up and work perfect with Alexa. I have an echo dot. I had to call Phillips tech support once for help because the lights weren't responding as well as expected. Tech support was very helpful, it turned out it was just the command words I was using. To change colors you need to say " Alexa, set (name of light) to (color)". Example: Alexa set Livingroom light to blue
customer_reviews.author: Leroy J.

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors but sometimes gets frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at my doorstep broken. I sent it back and was issued another to compensate myself. Has worked great! Pair with Alexa and apple HomeKit to get the full effect! I love asking Alexa/Siri to turn my lights on without flipping a switch. The only thing is I use this light in my ceiling fan, which has a dimmer. After leaving the light on for some time, it gets hot and malfunctions. It either will start strrobing quickly or when I go to shut it off it will turn itself right back on. Sometimes it gets frustrating but overall it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, not reliable enough
customer_reviews.text: This lightbulb gets the job done. If you pair two together, you can make some nice lighting using the built-in (or your own custom) scenes. That's great, but the hub it is dependent on, like the app, is severely lacking in functionality, especially when it comes to troubleshooting problems when they come up. As much as I like these lights and want to recommend them, the trouble they cause when the hub and/or app decide to not work is just not worth the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Incredible how these lights can change your mood! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing what lighting can do for your overall mood. These bulbs are the future, eventually, every house will have something like this. I upgraded from the Gen2, and it was worth it, the spectrum is much better. I can't wait to see what comes out next! Every night it's a rave in my room thanks to these! Almost got the entire house setup with them. The only downside is the protocol the bridge uses is quite slow for animations, but as far as the lights go they are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: JustSomeDev

customer_reviews.title: Great colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bulbs! The colors are definitely very rich. I never had the earlier generation, so I cannot comment on the difference between those and these new richer color versions. I also love that you can make your own scenes and save them either by choosing colors or even using pictures on your phone. The app is easy to use and I like the wake up feature that has the lights slowly fade on to wake you up. It is also nice that Alexa will recognize voice commands for these bulbs. She even will recognize scenes that you create yourself, as long as you rediscover scenes in the Alexa app.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The richer colors look so much better. Finally the hue bulbs can produce any and every color.
customer_reviews.author: Soiidus

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 of these throughout my house. Expensive but work great and last forever. I have these with the box set to auto go on and dim when I enter and leave my home including throughout the house at certain times of the day. I also bought the strip to go behind my TV dimly lighting up the back wall to any color flavor I like, like at the cinimas when we watch our movies on movie night! I never walk into a dark room. And at night each all auto dim down to my independent timer settings with my iPhone or iPad to off when its sleepy time.
customer_reviews.author: -D'

customer_reviews.title: Best thing that ever happened to my sleeping habits
customer_reviews.text: Hue lights changed my life. Orange, red and purple colors alleviated my insomnia and white and blue lights help me wake up in the morning. I use them with Alexa. Best thing that ever happened to my sleeping habits. Cant live without them. And not too difficult to set up!
customer_reviews.author: CamillaRose

customer_reviews.title: Converted my entire place to Hue lights and absolutely love it. Best upgrade to my apartment
customer_reviews.text: Converted my entire place to Hue lights and absolutely love it. Best upgrade to my apartment, both aesthetically and for my mental health, that I've ever made. Cannot recommend this system enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad bulb
customer_reviews.text: This bulb worked for a very short time. I've ordered other Phillips Hue bulbs before and never had a problem. However, this bulb worked for about four months and then just stopped working. I don't know what happened but it didn't work, I tried other bulbs in the lamp and they worked fine. I guess it was a bad bulb in the batch, but it's too expensive for this to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Starlyn159

customer_reviews.title: This bulb is easy to set up with the Philips app and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is easy to set up with the Philips app and the colors are beautiful. You can control the on/off of the bulb with Amazon's Alexa but not the colors. The Philips app is easy to install and use on your smartphone. It can be turned on or off when you are away from home also. Requires the Philips hub to control over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Like a sunset/sunrise modes that mimic the philips wake-up lights
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, and it still can't really do saturated yellows or greens, but colored LED's have come a long way in the last 5 years. I also think the Hue app could get some added functionality. Like a sunset/sunrise modes that mimic the philips wake-up lights, and that can be started any time - the only option now is via repeated daily schedules
customer_reviews.author: Greenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Well, they work pretty reliably, which is more than can be said for some remote control products (SmartThings, I'm looking at you). But even on the brightest, whitest setting I think they're too dim to be anything more than mood lighting (YMMV). Maybe someday I'll find a place to use them, but for now mine are all back in their boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Burke

customer_reviews.title: The amazingest alarm clock EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is way more lumens, and way better color temperature (Because I can choose it) than my dedicated wake-up light. I use an Echo Dot to control them, because digging around on my phone to turn them on and off is LAME, and controlling it like "Alexa, make the lights pink in the bedroom" makes me feel like I'm on Star Trek! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Shaeree

customer_reviews.title: ... 7 fixtures in my house now and I really enjoy them - particularly at night
customer_reviews.text: I have Philips Hue bulbs in 7 fixtures in my house now and I really enjoy them - particularly at night. Almost every night, I am able to set my hue lights to a very warm color and I find I relax and fall asleep much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Flop

customer_reviews.title: A lot of colors to choose from. Works with Siri.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome technology. Been waiting for this in a while. Works flawlessly with Siri and Apple Homekit. All the colors works well. Hope the price goes down a little, so i could invest in more.
customer_reviews.author: Fadhlan Rahim

customer_reviews.title: A bit glitchy sometimes, but very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool little devices -- and with the 3rd generation, these will do deep green along with the other colors. Four out of five stars because one or two of mine have a problem where they come back on full brightness when commanded to turn off. It seems to be a heat-related issue, since if I command them to dim, wait a few minutes, then turn them off, that works.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eric Carr

customer_reviews.title: Lights great Hue not so much
customer_reviews.text: Did i absolutely need colored lights that are a bit pricey? probably not. do they look great and create a nice scene? absolutely. color is very nice and ties into echo essy. biggest down fall on hue is the hue software itself. very clunky app. also keep in mind the distance from hub to first light can't exceed 30m with no obstructions. I had to move hub to get a solid connection
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what justifies the huge price difference from the white
customer_reviews.text: Color or just white I love my Hue! But I just don't see why the color is so much more money?? I really don't use the color adaptation much. the colors are weird, like the black light trend when I was a kid. I do use the dimmable mode much more, which you can do with the white bulbs that are 1/2 the price. I would say save your money and go with the white you most likely will be just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suki Doo

customer_reviews.title: Not to be used in Norway and or Europe!
customer_reviews.text: As almost all Philips Hue products, they are great. I do not recommend it to be used in Europe, if you buy it from the US. I bought it here and got it shipped to Norway and the voltage didn't match and hence did not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Yashakur

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and flexible with multiple options for third-party ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and flexible with multiple options for third-party software controls. The white and color give you the broad range of tunable whites from blue-white to the warm color of a burning candle. Then it can get all crazy with a third party app to create an instant disco that fades, chases, and strobes with your music. It costs more than other options, but with superior color quality and the flexibility to wake up to an illuminated bedroom or set vacation automatic on and off schedules, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: INCREASED COLOR RANGE BETTER ACCURACY
customer_reviews.text: I've owed the 2nd generation for over a year and recently purchased the 3rd generation for a friend. The colors in the 3rd generation are definitely improved. You will notice richer and more vibrant colors than before. Is it worth upgrading from your current bulbs? No, only if you have the spare income. It's not a dramatic enough improvement to justify the purchase but if you're looking to add more than go for it! The Hue LEDs are a creative and easy way to reinvent any room. Especially fun to use with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and scenes
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOVE my Hue bulbs. They're easy to screw into the lamp and pair up with the Hue bridge. They have beautiful colors and scenes. My favorites are Spring Blossom and Tropical Twilight. You can also create your own scenes. Of course it works with Alexa and if you create triggers through IFTT, you can tell Alexa to change scenes on your Hue bulb. :) The screw part of the Hue bulb is medium size, I guess, so they were unfortunately too big for our bedside lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mallafri

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambient lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend using these to replace the main lighting in room that has ceiling mounted lighting. Just doesn't feel bright enough. But when you put these in a low cost lamps (checkout the Mainstay 7.5" Spotlight Accent lamps), these really can add color to a room.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are perfect. From setting timers to wake up to gradually ...
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are perfect. From setting timers to wake up to gradually increasing light rather than jarring sound alarms, to all of the amazing color displays it can create - love hue. No issues with seller, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: but I flipping love the Hue LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I probably have a lightbulb addiction now, but I flipping love the Hue LED lights. I've spent way too much money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L.

customer_reviews.title: I have bought many of these and I like them, but the quality of the glass is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these and I like them, but the quality of the glass is really bad, they should make it stronger or some sort of plastic. I have a standing lamp, and was removing the bulb to replace with another one to setup, the bulb slipped and fell inside the lamp shade, like 2 inches, and that broke the glass. I would expect the quality to be better since I just paid $50 per bulb.crazy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated version is even better
customer_reviews.text: We have had Hue bulbs for several years in our home. Bought these to expand our system. The new version of these bulbs have better color and connect faster to the bridge. Still the same old interface to control the bulbs and that needs some serious help from Phillips but the bulbs work great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hue products ... Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bulb. But Philips dropped the ball so badly, but actually connecting to that bulb, is always an issue and I have a working Bridge. it ruins everything in makes and makes Philips Hue purchases a huge regret. And the new update won't download. Avoid all hue.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy Wales

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Gen lights are PERFECT - thank you Philips!
customer_reviews.text: Third time's a charm. They might be pricey to buy, but the result is amazing. Millions of colors at your fingertip through the Hue App and displayed with these heavy-duty LED lights. They do run warm, however, so keep that in mind if you have heat sensitive lamp shades...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sartori (fka Gaedeke)

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light, I wish it was easier to control/change the colors with Alexa, but with the app you can do it all. Some of the colors could be deeper, and the lumens brighter, but overall it does something none of my other lights do, and it does it well. I've had it for about 6-8months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: Addition to the family!
customer_reviews.text: We now have six color and six white hue lights. I never have to touch a switch unless I want to! Puts out great color and paired up like a snap. Firmware updated in the background, just like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are fantastic and the Philips Hue app is extremely easy to use. It allows you to choose pre determined scenes for different moods or drag your finger across your screen to pick the exact color. While it's not a must to have colored lights in a room, it is very cool and the kids love it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lad

customer_reviews.title: When I thought I was purchasing new bulbs, (no ...
customer_reviews.text: When I thought I was purchasing new bulbs, (no where at the Description Page stated they were not new - at least when I purchased them), I received Refurbished Bulbs!!!
customer_reviews.author: DLA

customer_reviews.title: A 2018 must (if you haven’t already)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fantastic way to embrace the new age of the smart home. Easy, fun and really becomes part of your daily routine.Love the product but really Philips needs to reduce pricing. They’re not the only one, and I would have a lot more if they were less.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: A musy have for any tech nerd like me
customer_reviews.text: Well for starters you can control your lightbulbs with Alexa on your Echo or Echo dot. You can control your lights from your phone which is awesome she you travel and live in a shady neighborhood. Didn't I mention for like .99 you can buy some awesome apps that control the lights.
customer_reviews.author: gregory duty

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product. Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Not cheap, but you get what you pay for. Easy to program API. Easily programmable individually or in groups. Works great with Alexa/Google home. The white settings are plenty bright. Color is a bit less bright, but it's state of the art.
customer_reviews.author: anon12387912837

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Light started blinking at random times shortly after purchase. Customer service is extremely unhelpful. Definitely recommend getting a non-Hue light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Bsa223

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I love Philips Hue.
customer_reviews.text: I am already heavily invested in the Philips Hue environment so these work great. I keep buying more a few at a time to slowly control all of my lights in the house from my iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: E. Larson

customer_reviews.title: It works fine as a normal bulb but I thoroughly unimpressed by ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Alexa. It works fine as a normal bulb but I thoroughly unimpressed by the color changing. After a year it now flashes on and off repetitively. And I have to turn it off for about 5 minutes so it stops.
customer_reviews.author: BKshopper

customer_reviews.title: you know this is a great product. The colors are amazing and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you don't already know what philips hue is, go watch some youtube videos on it. If you do, you know this is a great product. The colors are amazing and it is so fun to play with. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Occamy Box

customer_reviews.title: They auto turn on when hot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color. I had some problems because when the bulb gets too hot, it turns on itself automatically after turning it off. You have to turn it off manually and that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vigil

customer_reviews.title: More colors than the last version.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade - I have a few of the 2nd gen bulbs, and these definitely have a wider color range, especially in the greens. Otherwise, nothing really different than I'm used to from Philips' Hue line - just good quality and functionality
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully. I have the app and have used all ...
customer_reviews.text: works wonderfully. I have the app and have used all the colors available. Highly recommended for people who want to add a bit of spunk to their home It's also fun for guests! or shroom trips ;)
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Dan

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say? It's a great product worth the money. I love the shades of color, it always pops on fast and even when I'm changing colors it switches immediately to the new shade. Lovely lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says, nice to have on porch to set color and brightness, also nice for holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: software could use some better features and support
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but effective system, software could use some better features and support. Occasionally buggy. Bright enough, but not as much as would be expected for the price. Well built and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the new hues are light years better than last years
customer_reviews.author: Jfield

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Really like these bulbs. I'll give 'em 5 stars when they drop the price to a much more reasonable level.
customer_reviews.author: Shoobadoobydoo

customer_reviews.title: Bright, installed quickly, Colorful
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the living room. The Hue system is pretty awesome. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Amofa

customer_reviews.title: Love this bulb!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought just the white hue bulbs. I decided to try out the color to see how they were. I honestly didn't think they would be all that wonderful, so I just bought one. Wrong! The color is so cool! I'm now going to replace all my white hue bulbs with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lights.
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. Nothing like hitting the lights from my bed and turning my living room into a dance club.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Mood Lighting But Cool Tho
customer_reviews.text: There are many other options now at a less expensive price point. I think these are excellent but overpriced for "mood lighting".
customer_reviews.author: Honest P

customer_reviews.title: I love all the Philips Hue products do far
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Philips Hue products do far. I have continued to expand my collection over the last few years. I continue to see new updates to the software and upgrades to the lights themselves. Overall this is a great product line and I hope to see it continue to grow and expand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gray

customer_reviews.title: Much better colors with the 3rd gen
customer_reviews.text: The 3rd generation light colors are so much more rich than the 2nd generation. I was shocked at how blue the blues were. My 2nd generation blue looked purple and my green looked yellow. Now I have true blues and greens.
customer_reviews.author: MattTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Change your gf to suit your needs with Phillips hue.
customer_reviews.text: I can turn my girlfriend into a blue gf or a green gf or a red gf. Many other color gf's to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: abaet

customer_reviews.title: Set up difficulty
customer_reviews.text: The only major issues I have had with my Phillips hue lights have been a set up issue, which seems to have to do with the WiFi set up in my apartment, which Phillips did not know how to resolve. I still look forward to getting them to work with my phone, but have yet to be successful.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family room. Truly no one needs these bulbs in their life but if you already getting smart bulbs, these are the way to go. So much fun making the house change colors and our kids love dancing to music while the bulbs flash different colors to the music.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze B.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice improvement on previous generation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice improvement on the original Hue color bulb which was unable to render blue/turquoise colors properly. This new version can render a much wider color spectrum, and is still able to create really nice and warm whites as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: On occasion this blub will just start flashing. I ...
customer_reviews.text: On occasion this blub will just start flashing. I have 3 of the previous version plus this one all hooked to Alexa and when we say, "Alexa turn off all the lights" this one starts flashing. The only fix has been to turn off the switch and let it rest for a while. Don't know why this one does it and not the other 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great what the hell give it a try colors are the life of light""
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright & useful as expected.  😞
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as the cfl's they replaced so we were a bit disappointed. I've tried to look at the Phillips website to see if I was doing something wrong and there's no mention at all of them being dim. I know we're not the only 2 people in the world who feel this way, right??
customer_reviews.author: William Hinkly

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than the gen 2 lights. I wish I could replace all my gen 2 lights with these, but that will take time at the price they are selling for.
customer_reviews.author: KyleM

customer_reviews.title: but love the product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the price, but love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Hue bulbs are absolutely awesome. Even though rated for 800 lumens
customer_reviews.text: Hue bulbs are absolutely awesome. Even though rated for 800 lumens, they are kind of dim when displaying colors, so make sure to have ample fixtures with bulbs (like large multi-bulb lamps or many lamps) when lighting a large space.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Totally cool product - I have 5 in my house already. Would have more if they weren't so expensive. The app for the phone is a little glitchy, works best with an apple device, cant get it to work at all with my husband's Samsung 7.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Whatever your mood is at your frivolous command
customer_reviews.text: Light colors seems true on this generation. I'm having fun creating scenes with the spectrum at my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Bengalbabies

customer_reviews.title: The greens are really great and the reds are even deeper
customer_reviews.text: The greens are really great and the reds are even deeper. Great upgrade and you can use them with your old bridge!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Phillips Hue Gen 3 lights......  Now green is actually green!
customer_reviews.text: BIG difference in this generation of lights. Green is actually green! A larger spectrum of colors are now available.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lights!
customer_reviews.text: They do everything that's advertised. They ad a lot of character to whatever room you put them in. I own a few different Phillips hue products and overall I am impressed with the technology and functionality. Set up with Google assistant and Google home is relatively simple as well. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is way to much fun. The colors are bright and beautiful and sets the mood of the room so well. I thought it was silly when my husband wanted these but now I think I like them even more than he does!!
customer_reviews.author: FiFi

customer_reviews.title: How did I get along before these things?
customer_reviews.text: These are one of those things that you hate to spend that much money on, but when you do, you wonder how you got along without them. Works perfect with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Travis (Amazon customer since 2006)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb that provides plenty of light and can be controlled by both your phone and Alexa
customer_reviews.author: Vicious

customer_reviews.title: works great with Amazon Echo.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Phillips lights I love my Phillips lights I love my Phillips lights. They work great with Amazon Alexa it was so easy to set up in the colors are just beautiful. I'm kind of addicted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Comer1434

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE BEAUTIFUL LIGHTS AND THE APPS YOU CAN PURCHASE TO UTILIZE THE COLORED LIGHT FUNCTIONS!!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO MAX. 3

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors, but very expensive compared to alternative LED ...
customer_reviews.text: Rich colors, but very expensive compared to alternative LED bulbs... however, developing software using the Hue API is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jens

customer_reviews.title: They are normally fantastic, however
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. They are normally fantastic, however, after a month one has started flickering until i take it out and put it back in. Later, it does it again.
customer_reviews.author: Watja Lukinat

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love these lights. At first you might think "wow these are expensive little lights." BUT SO WORTH IT. Energy efficiency with all the frills. 15 years life expectancy .
customer_reviews.author: HrdCorSteelerFan

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrong with phillips hue color changing bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Love all my phillips hue color changing LED bulbs, out of the 14 I have only one has failed and Phillips is currently working with me to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Dobry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for the past few months. Reliable withe the app and produces a wide range of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! Only reason I didn't rate 5 stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Only reason I didn't rate 5 stars is because the peak brightness is a little underwhelming and the default white which it reverts back to after power shuts off is a very warm dim white. Using with Alexa is a must. You can tell her to set lights to white and it brightens them back to a more normal white.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were brighter and more full of color instead of looking washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Liam558

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs work great and have lasted, change color, on/off, it is really nice to have such flexibility
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these installed now. Love these bulbs. Which they were cheaper though. Also wish they would release a 3rd Gen GU10 bulb already!
customer_reviews.author: Trips

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: 3rd generation is the ticket the green is green not yellow like my 2nd generation bulb, not sure how I got a 2nd generation bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J. Gervais

customer_reviews.title: Instant ambience
customer_reviews.text: I have my home on a HUE lighting system. I use the bulbs all over. Dramatic lighting effects. Instance ambience.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Greener greens, Bluer Blues
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to our Hue lighting system. This bulb has a much improved blue and green spectrum compared to the first generation Hue bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDog

customer_reviews.title: These are just fun to have
customer_reviews.text: These are just fun to have. I bought 4 for the living room and pretty happy. Hope they last at least 10 years. I'll comment back when the first one goes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Can easily set the mood with a couple swipes of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding range of colors. Can easily set the mood with a couple swipes of my phone. Very cool. Bit pricey, but worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Grant

customer_reviews.title: The new colors are very good; I just wish they looked as bright as ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a little too pricey to get 5 stars. The new colors are very good; I just wish they looked as bright as the white.
customer_reviews.author: SW Engineer

customer_reviews.title: They are fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to set up. Work well with the Eco Dots. And are just fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I'm invested in Philips Hue mostly because I got a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm invested in Philips Hue mostly because I got a starter set as a gift. I plan on switching over to more of these bulbs over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Light of my life.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy the starter kit you will become enthralled by these lights. Gorgeous, and mood altering. Its the best way to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Work great for our entrance lights
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised, cheaper than the color ones. Work great for our entrance lights. We have them on timer.
customer_reviews.author: andrea bernal

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but awesome. Love the colors. This new version have way more accurate and sutil hues.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun lights that last forever!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to change colors. Gives a room a fun presentation. Always can change to white for the brightest light as well.
customer_reviews.author: tstrasser

customer_reviews.title: Love these bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs - so much better than the plug, but expensive. hopefully they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: while the rest still works fine. Yet
customer_reviews.text: The glass part broke, while the rest still works fine. Yet, Phillips offers no replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: trekkie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Added to my collection. These are absolutely an amazing product especially linked with my Alexa and motion sensor The upgraded app makes everything so much easierl
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance A19 60W Equivalent Dimmable LED Smart Bulb (1 Bulb Compatible with Amazon Alexa Apple HomeKit and Google Assistant)
product_meta.description: Limitless possibilities for an extraordinary experience. Include a Philips Hue white and color ambiance bulb in your Philips Hue system and experience high quality white and colored light that offers you endless possibilities.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (hub required, Alexa device and hub sold separately)

Play with light and choose from 16 million colors to instantly change the look and atmosphere of your room or control your lights with your Voice device (requires the Hue Bridge, sold separately). Save your favorite light settings and recall them whenever you want with the tap of a finger
Requiring the Hue Bridge (sold separately) for the full Hue experience

To install, simply screw the smart bulb into your desired light location, download the Hue mobile app and pair your Hue bridge. Control smart-bulb-equipped lamps and overhead lights via the Philips Hue App. Ideal for your favorite ceiling fan lights, floor lamps, table lamps, pendant lights, and more throughout your home
Easily expand your lighting system with accessories (sold separately), such as a Hue Dimmer Switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor. Pair it for automation with your existing Nest or SmartThings system

specifications.Included Components: 1 Hue White and Color Ambiance Bulb
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars469 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
